title: Ticket #3490: Enhance condor_userprio to show per-group quota demand
description: The group quota structure contains a list of the demand from each group. Enhance condor_userprio to print out this field.
remarks:

my preliminary review is that the patch looks good. I'll leave the ticket open until I can actully run the code in chtc. -tj
